synopsis: In episode #13 titled 'SOLOOO 2: I quit my job', Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, emphasizing the importance of self-discovery and taking breaks to reconnect with one's passions. He discusses his experiences traveling, DJing, and exploring new hobbies while reflecting on societal pressures and the pursuit of fulfillment.
quotes: Sometimes it takes an incredible amount of courage and privilege to take that leap into something unknown.
We're not on this planet to slave away and be productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe.
You can make a good show and the world may not be ready for it.
If you're just staying numb and in the same cycles of stress and release, it's like you're not helping anyone.
It's not about the results. It's about the process.
You should get maybe good at one or two things at a time.
If you have privilege, you should use it.
Your time and energy are valuable; examine what pushes you to go places you don't want to be.
Perchance to connect with others, perchance to enjoy life.
